title: Global bauxite import and export 2005 to 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Export, and Import. The y axis indicates the Trade in thousands metric tons and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Export, and Import are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Import, and lastly, 2. Export.
Throughout the period, Import generally had the highest Trade in thousands metric tons relative to others with an average of 71087.69, and it reached its maximum at 2018 with a value of 108775.3.
Export mostly had the least Trade in thousands metric tons with a mean value of 49288.24, which peaked at 2013 with a value of 91886.1.
